title: Murderous Little Darlings
description: Three siblings. An endless list of victims. A whole lot of time to kill.* * *With two specimens of the undead on either side of her, Juliana knew there was no escape. Kill the one they had selected for her, or be killed, and become one of them. What had the neighbours in the road called them, back when their childhood pranks were just that? Oh yes, she remembered now. Murderous Little Darlings. They had the faces of angels, but possessed the very soul of the Devil. Marcus had fully embraced his vampire side from the moment he was born. Rocco was the second eldest, and had fought the temptation all of his life. Then Marcus finally broke him.That just left Juliana. Will she resist them, or join in the hunt?
author: John    Hennessy
